Desc.entry: Richard Ashbee offers talks on the following subjects: Seabirds/Coastal Wildlife; Eyes on Nature; Puffin around Shetland; Reed Bed Wildlife; Seasons - Spring Wildlife, Summer Wildlife, Autumn Wildlife, Winter Wildlife; Wildlife of the Black Forest (Germany); Wildlife of the Two Camargues (France); Wildlife of the Somme (France); Wildlife of the French Alps; Wildlife of the Eastern Pyrenees; Wildlife of the Western Pyrenees; Wildlife of Shetland; Wildlife of the Spey Valley; Wildlife of the Vendee (France); Wildlife of the Central Pyrenees; Wildlife of the Ossoue Valley. All talks are illustrated with slides or digital media. Fee Charged.
